messages.message:
Sr. Software Developer Opportunity

Dear Brian, 

I came across your profile on LinkedIn; I am very interested in learning more about your development background. 

We are looking for a talented .Net Developer to join our team. 

U-Haul has been in business for 71 years, we provide a collaborative, stable working environment where we encourage our developers to share their ideas and continue to grow their development skills. 

We us the latest technologies in the Microsoft Technology Stack. We provide competitive pay and a strong benefits package. 

Please let me know if you would be interested in setting up a time to talk about this opportunity. 

Thank you 
Dona

Dona Riles
IT Recruiter
U-Haul International Inc.
2727 North Central Avenue
Phoenix, AZ 85004
Phone: 602-263-6627 ext: 514116
dona_riles@uhaul.com
Sorry, I don't do contracts because I don't want the hiring manager to think I am not a part of the team.
It is not a contract, It is a full time opportunity
please let me know if you would be interested in setting up a time to talk.

I already applied there and they turned me down. They are just interviewing so that they can get H1B visas.

Brian,

Do you know who you interviewed with?
